text: Chilandanyo cha awala waakutolaga ipanje yao petala lya Allah, chili chisawu lusongolo lumpepe lwalukopwesye masache nsano nagawili, mwisache lililyose nikuwa mwana songolo syakwana lichila, Allah ni akun'jonjechesyaga jwansachile, soni Allah ni Jwakwanila kusyene (ku iwumbe Yakwe), Jwakumanyilila nnope
